member.name: ISyncMgrConflictFolder.GetConflictIDList
member.param: A pointer to a PIDL, specified relative to the folder.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflictFolder
member.summary: Exposes a method that gets the conflict ID list for a conflict object.
